mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.cover AS "cover.id", a.audit_time AS "auditTime", a.audit_user AS "auditUser.id", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.audit_result AS "auditResult", a.apply_item AS "applyItem", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.project_name AS "projectName" /* cover.no AS "cover.no", auditUser.name AS "auditUser.name"*/

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cover_audit( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, cover, audit_time, audit_user, audit_status, audit_result, apply_item, remarks, project_id, project_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{cover.id}, #{auditTime}, #{auditUser.id}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditResult}, #{applyItem}, #{remarks}, ${projectId}, #{projectName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cover_audit SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, cover = #{cover.id}, audit_time = #{auditTime}, audit_user = #{auditUser.id}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_result = #{auditResult}, apply_item = #{applyItem}, remarks = #{remarks}, project_id = #{projectId}, project_name = #{projectName} WHERE id = #{id}
